maker: Master of the Dresden Prayer Book, Valerius Maximus, Simon de Hesdin, et al
title: The Temperate and the Intemperate: Miniature from Valerius Maximus, Faits et dits mémorables des romains, translation by Simon de Hesdin and Nicolas de Gonesse of Facta et dicta memorabilia
